This is my wife's boyfriend's favorite game!

I really like this game lol
Simple concept that always has me on the edge of my seat. The abilities and perks make this game a ton of fun.

Dead Bug Daylight是一款BUG才是本體的遊戲
買BGU送DBD~
一時BUG一時爽，一直BUG一直爽的好遊戲！
살인마를 하면 왕따되는 느낌이라 생존자를 하는데 어느덧 생존마가 되어가고 있다.
UwU no me dejan no poner nada. el juego es muy bueno

This game is very poorly balanced. Survivors and Killers can be impossible to manage all depending on what abilities/add-ons they decide to use which makes the game feel like Russian roulette. The gameplay is also boring moment to moment. Killers spend a large amount of time simply walking around to find someone and players spend minutes doing glorified quicktime events.

I would definitely recommend to those who enjoy having a good scare.  Along with the thrill of the chase.  It's like being in a horror movie.  I've been playing this game off and on for the last few years and I still enjoy coming back to play.

DBD -  тот случай, когда игра категории Охотник -Жертва, Жертва-Охотник, является неоспоримым победителем в данной категории  своего жанра. Приятная картинка, колоритные запоминающиеся персонажи, неплохой выбор кастомизации , графический движок , физика и многое другое, заставят даже бывалого геймера, провести не один час за данным шедевром симулятаром маньяка, так-же можете попробывать себя в роли жертвы, бегите или примите бой с друзьями против нечисти.
В игре присутствуют разные механики типа stealth, а так игра остается все тем же леденящим душу survival - horror. Рекомендую всем любителям игр 3vs1.

Um jogo ótimo, e não necessita de um computador muito potente para rodar tudo no mínimo.
Ótimo para jogar com amigos, e mantém a graça jogar sozinho. O Gameplay é bem diferente, o que dá a principal graça ao game.
quem joga de bruxa deverá morrer :)
very different fun game to play with friends
Jogo mto bom,principalmente pra jogar com amigos.Ùnico ponto negativo é a hitbox bugada
this game has classic charicters from horror movies like: halloween, texas chainsaw massicer, saw, stranger things, screem, nightmare on elmstreet.

Great concept, great game. Only downside being the players.

Das Spiel macht mega Spaß, vor allem mit Freunden. Aber...

Nehmt das Wiggeln entweder GANZ RAUS oder ERNIEDRIGT die Hakenzahl oder ERNIEDRIGT die Zeit zum Wiggeln. Es macht fast nie Sinn zu Wiggeln, weil immer ein Haken in der Nähe ist. Man braucht verdammt viel Glück, um da mal zu entkommen. Wozu soll man es da noch versuchen? Macht es bitte ... bitte ... bitte.

Игра огонь, я забыл что такое страх и узнал что такое инсульт.

Extremely unbalanced and not at all optimised! The devs don't listen to a majority of their community. Overall this game is toxic towards new comers and a waste of money. Do not buy it! (I've played the game for almost 1000 hours, so I think it's fair to say I know what I'm talking about). Spend your money elsewhere.

For the past few years that I've been a part of the Dead by Daylight community, I truly enjoyed my experiences, both good and bad. I love all of the chapters that are released for this game and overall this has been a fun ride these past 4 years. I hope they keep doing what they're doing to balance the game and make it more enjoyable for newcomers and "OG's" of Dead by Daylight. I would recommend this game for you guys that have a group of friends to play with, you may regret playing at first, but this game will grow on you! (P.S, I miss my Legacy tho, hopefully I can get it again someday, played since Alpha and got nothin to show for.)

O jogo em si é divertido, mas pra não passar tanto extress, deve se dedicar muito tempo á ele. O maior problema que tive com esse jogo foi os bugs, como a hitbox da janela, ou o bug do DS.
Vale a pena comprar, mas para o jogo realmente ser bom, precisa se dedicar e acostumar com os bugs.
Really enjoyable, best of it's style.
it was fun to play and had Michael Myers. that made me happy

Best of its genre. 

Game system build in a way it should motivate players to cooperate and help eachother. Surely you can still meet ones that dont but its not really common, because they would just lose a lot of potential points for that behavior, so what would be the point anyway. 

Biggest con might be some annoying champs and/or skills you need to deal with sometimes.  But as you get the better knowledge of how they work, you can also use them to your advantage and use them against your opponents, which is fun. So overall pretty neat.
This game furfills my dream of being a generator fixer guy thing
fun game but they keep nerfing the survivors and buffing the killers..
